question: You are taking a course at a local college. The deadline for your project was last week but you haven't finished it.Write a letter to your lecturer. In your letterintroduce yourselfexplain why you haven't handed in the project yetrequest more time to do it.
text: I am writing this letter with regards to my failed submission of my project record on time.Due to unavoidable health issues.

My name is Rajkumar and pursuing a Master's in Hotel and Management at Tum Tum Management Institution.As you know,I am one of the smartest students in your class and the Topper in the Management Classes .However , My area is interest in cookery innovation and Presentation.

Last week,You gave a project title in Cooking and Classy presentation and informed us project submission should not be later than One Week.Since Project content requires large source information.We grouped as a team to collect sources of information so that work will be spread evenly between the team members

Two days before ,I meet in an accident and was immediately rushed to the hospital .Later, the Doctor informed us there is a small Air Crack in my right little finger.The general physician recommended taking bed rest for at least  2 Weeks and meditation was suggested .
Due to this ,We  are unable to submit the project on time.Kindly consider my current situation and provide us with another week's time to do the submission .
I look forward to hearing from you soon
